Definition.WordDefinition:
Ruthless \Ruth"less\, a. Having no ruth; cruel; pitiless. [1913 Webster]
Their rage the hostile bands restrain, All but the ruthless monarch of the main. --Pope. [1913 Webster] -- {Ruth"less*ly}, adv. -- {Ruth"less*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
ruthless adj : without mercy or pity; "an act of ruthless ferocity"; "a monster of remorseless cruelty" [syn: {pitiless}, {remorseless}, {unpitying}]
